question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct about Amaravati School of Arts?
  1. Use of white marbles is very common in Amaravati School of Arts
  2. Most of the themes were based on Buddha’s life and Jataka tales
  3. This School of arts was first patronized by the Satavahanas and later by the Ikshvakus 
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Amaravati School of Arts evolved mainly in Deccan India. Use of white marbles is very common feature in Amaravati School of Arts. Most of the themes in this School of Art were based on Buddha’s life and Jataka tales. This School of arts was first patronized by the Satavahanas and later by the Ikshvakus.
